Store author details for later usage

Source: R/store_authors.R
store_authors.Rd

Store author details for later usage

Usage

store_authors(x = ".")

Arguments

x

Either a checklist object or a path to the source code. Defaults to ..

See also

Other utils: ask_rightsholder_funder(), ask_yes_no(), author2df(), bookdown_zenodo(), c_sort(), create_hexsticker(), execshell(), get_default_org_list(), inbo_org_list(), install_pak(), menu_first(), use_author(), validate_email(), validate_orcid(), yesno()
